Text.Page:
This camp's strategic significance rose when those enormous {@LinkCreature:15#15#fimbrilisks} moved into the ruins north of here.

If we're overrun, Pora Elinu will be in grave danger.

We must eliminate the threat. Could you gather a party and take care of that, ?
Such bravery. The federation is safe in your hands. Take this humble reward for a job well done.
